document.full_text: political pressure increased on socialist leader martine aubry tuesday to run in the party's presidential primary after the favorite, imf chief dominique strauss-kahn, was charged with sexual assault in new york.
document.title: french left struggle to replace strauss-kahn
lines_and_colors: political pressure increased on socialist leader martine aubry tuesday to run in the party's presidential primary after the favorite, imf chief dominique strauss-kahn, was charged with sexual assault in new york.
